alert.note: Alert for Kennebec; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 24 at 5:46AM EST until December 25 at 4:40AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Sagadahoc and Kennebec Counties. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Somerset and Kennebec Counties. For the Kennebec River...including Skowhegan, North Sidney, Augusta, Hallowell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Hallowell. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Parking lots along Front Street begin to flood. Town dock begins to flood. At 13.0 feet, Water enters the back side of buildings along Water Street. Front Street becomes completely submerged. The parking lot by town dock flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:12 AM EST Saturday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 11.9 feet late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
